channel.title: Run.bat Error with 503 Server
channel.description:
The run.bat said this when I clicked run to run my 503 Source:
Running Server on port: 43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "4.67264229473597 at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(unknown source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(unknown Source) at RS2E.World.Items.loadItemList(Items.java:173) at RS2E.World.Items.<init>(Items.java:34) at RS2E.GameEngine.<init>(GameEngine.java:50) at RS2E.Main.main(main.java:23) Press any key to continue . . .
can anyone help me fix it? :(

item.title: Run.bat Error with 503 Server
item.dc:creator: @x0wntx x0wntx
item.description:
@x0wntx wrote:

[quote=“©Steven©, post:2, topic:227453”] java.lang.NumberFormatException

public class NumberFormatException
extends IllegalArgumentException

Thrown to indicate that the application has attempted to convert a string to one of the numeric types, but that the string does not have the appropriate format.

EDIT:

Sources: http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/NumberFormatException.html[/quote]

that does not really help I do not understand how I am able to Fix it.

Read full topic
